tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesDataFashionCollection (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_name VARCHAR(50),
    designer_name VARCHAR(50),
    sale_date DATE,
    total_sales DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
    FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES fashion_collections(collection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FashionCollections (
    collection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_name VARCHAR(100),
    designer_name VARCHAR(100),
    design_theme VARCHAR(100),
    launch_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sale_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_id UUID,
    sale_date TIMESTAMP,
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES FashionCollections(collection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrendsAnalysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_id UUID,
    trend_description TEXT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES FashionCollections(collection_id)
);
